page.title: 11ARMED FORCES
page.content: In our area we have an army head- quarters. Not many people know what it is there for. When we sent out our survey only two people said{Western {District H.Q.}When we asked forces personel where they worked they responded with only one answer, { {Copthorne Barracks.}One person said that they had worked for the army and the R.A.F. Most people started working for the forces between the ages of 18 and 22, and most are able to see their family daily. We were surprised that not many people were aware of the army presence especially as there is a {Territorial Army Headquarters}close to {Coleham School}as well. In addition the{Light Infantry}have been in Shrewsbury at{Copthorne}for over 100 years. Soon the infantry is to leave and{Copthorne Barracks}is to house the {Western District Headquarters.
